sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer čustvo ali dogajanje,
revives
ali
is revived
, postane spet močno ali uspešno.

seg.quote: My spirits revived as we drove out into the countryside.
They failed to fulfil their promises to revive the economy.

sense.def:
To revive someone
pomeni pomagati nekomu, ki se je onesvestil, da spet pride k zavesti.

seg.quote: They had difficulty in reviving him.
